WrestlerMod:Approval.DESCRIPTION: A measure of how well-liked you are by fans. Playing #yDirty cards affects your Fan Approval, as does applying debuffs.

WrestlerMod:CleanFighting.DESCRIPTION: Ending your turn without playing more than 1 Attack increases your #yFan #yApproval by 5.

WrestlerMod:Dirty.DESCRIPTION: Playing a Dirty card decreases your #yFan #yApproval by 5.

WrestlerMod:Elbow.DESCRIPTION: A 1-cost #yAttack card with #yEthereal and #yExhaust that deals modest damage.

WrestlerMod:SignatureMove.DESCRIPTION: A special attack card that can be obtained during combat when the conditions are met.

WrestlerMod:SignatureMoveCardIndicator.DESCRIPTION: Your trademark move this run is

WrestlerMod:Sprained.DESCRIPTION: Sprained creatures lose HP at the start of their turn, and remain Sprained if they attack.

WrestlerMod:Grappled.DESCRIPTION: #yGrappled enemies receive [#ED3030]+30%[] more and deal [#B6F8C0]-30%[] less damage. Grapple breaks once you're dealt #b10 damage in a single turn, or if you Grapple another enemy.

WrestlerMod:Knee.DESCRIPTION: A 1-cost #yAttack card with #yEthereal and #yExhaust that deals moderate damage.

WrestlerMod:BrutesTrophy.DESCRIPTION: A relic which grants 2 #yStrength at the start of each combat if you're #yUnpopular.

WrestlerMod:PeoplesCrown.DESCRIPTION: A relic which grants 2 #yDexterity at the start of each combat if you're #yPopular.

WrestlerMod:CobraClutch.DESCRIPTION: Cobra Clutches are 0-cost #yAttack cards which deal modest damage and apply #yPoison.

WrestlerMod:TemporaryBuffer.DESCRIPTION: Prevents the next time your would lose HP this turn.

Choked.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, loses HP.

Flex.DESCRIPTION: A 0-cost [#9e2b2e]Ironclad Skill card which grants temporary #yStrength.

Stun.DESCRIPTION: Unable to take any combat actions.
